author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Moving the package to CommonTools properly reflects its dual usage by Fast Simulation and Reconstruction. This was discussed in #26016.

#### PR validation:

Did `git cms-checkdeps -a` and recompiled all the code.  
After the change I did `git grep FastSimulation/Base` and not files were returned.
title: Move FastSimulation/BaseParticlePropagator to CommonTools
